summary: The implementation successfully covers all core requirements. Product catalog with grid layout, WhatsApp integration, public browsing, Internet Identity admin authentication, CRUD operations, and warm earthy design aesthetics are all present. All required images are referenced in the BuildRequest but no evidence of their actual implementation appears in the diff (placeholder logic exists but actual image files are not shown).

missing_requirements.requirement: Two specific images required: hero-banner.dim_1920x600.png and product-placeholder.dim_400x400.png
missing_requirements.reason: BuildRequest specifies two images with exact dimensions and descriptions (hero banner with elegant product display and warm lighting, minimalist product placeholder). The diff shows placeholder logic in ProductCard.tsx but no evidence of actual image files or hero banner implementation.

hallucinated_features.description: User profile management system with getCallerUserProfile, getUserProfile, and saveCallerUserProfile functions
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest explicitly states in non-goals: 'User accounts or customer login system'. The backend implements a complete user profile system with UserProfile type and storage, which contradicts this constraint.
BuildRequest specifies warm, earthy tones (terracotta, sage green, cream) with no mention of dark mode. The CSS implements a complete dark theme with different color values.
